objects.text:
• Premium Stainless Steel
• Chronograph Functionality
• Elegant Black Dial
• Water-Resistant Design

product_details.name: Michael Kors Lexington Chronograph - Luxurious Stainless Steel Masterpiece
product_details.description:
• Premium stainless steel construction with fluted bezel
• Sophisticated chronograph functionality with three sub-dials
• Elegant black dial with Roman numeral markers
• Date window display at 4 o'clock position
• Durable link bracelet with secure deployment clasp
• Water-resistant design for everyday wear
• Signature Michael Kors branding on dial
• Luminous hands for enhanced visibility
• Professional dress watch suitable for all occasions
• Precise quartz movement for reliable timekeeping
• Classic silver-tone finish that pairs with any attire
• Scratch-resistant mineral crystal face

banner_details:
The banner displays a luxurious, modern design featuring a premium wristwatch product at the center-right positioned over a richly styled navy-blue grid background. It contains a bold title (`heading`) and elegant subheading (`subheading`) in the top-left, both displaying strong branding emphasis. Below it, a tagline (`tagline`) enhances the product's appeal. The main features of the product are listed in a bullet-point format (`description`) on the left mid-section. Toward the bottom left is the price (`price`), styled prominently in a futuristic font. Adjacent to it is a high-contrast call-to-action button (`cta`) over a light background block (`cta_background`). The centerpiece is a sleek watch image (`product_image`) overlapping subtle circular highlights, giving depth and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue (`#0D1D3A`)
- Charcoal Slate (`#162649`)
- Midnight Blue (`#0A1428`)
- Soft Silver Grey (`#C0C0C0`)
- White (`#FFFFFF`)
product_color: The product image of the Michael Kors watch features a sophisticated and luxurious color palette dominated by metallic silver (#C0C0C0), deep teal green (#013F43), and subtle rose gold accents (#B76E79). The silver is used on the strap and highlights the frame, creating a sleek and polished look. The deep teal dial adds contrast while emphasizing the timeless elegance of the watch. Rose gold reflections subtly blend into the metallic finish, giving warmth and refinement without overwhelming the design. High contrast between dark and bright shades, along with reflective surfaces, adds depth and definition—ideal for a stylish, upscale advertisement banner.
